p.i: Raphael4Gwt: A vector drawing library for GWT - A wrapper of RaphaelJs JavaScript library for GWT - Java

div.p: Raphael4Gwt is a wrapper GWT library for Raphaël JavaScript library for vector drawing in the web.

It is based on GWT overlay types for directly manipulating the JavaScript objects from Java code without any extra overhead. So this has two main conequences: first, the Raphael Java code is equivalent to what native javascript raphael code would be, and second, working with overlay types can be a little "special" for Java Programmers.
This document is a full Raphael4Gwt user's manual containing online example with java sources that are shoued in this same manual doucment.

It is recommended that the user be familiar with some vector drawing technology like SVG, raphael, etc for a quicker understanding of this document. Neverthtless, this document will try to explain all in detail so this is not actually required, but please reffer to the following references for a more in depth information about Raphaël JavaScript library:

ul.li: raphaeljs.com - the Raphaël JavaScript library home site.
Raphaël Tutorial - by this same author.
Raphaël Reference - the Raphaël JavaScript library reference.
Raphaël Reference - the Raphaël JavaScript library reference.
raphaeljs.com - the Raphaël JavaScript library home site.
raphaeljs.com - the Raphaël JavaScript library home site.
raphaeljs.com - the Raphaël JavaScript library home site.
